posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked:
Today, weâ€™re releasing version 7.85 to beta. If youâ€™re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This update fixes a small bug that sometimes caused the screen to briefly flash after tapping on a video or picture. Your screen may still flicker if you open a video of your friend trying to blow out the trick candles on their birthday cake though

In addition, with this release weâ€™re continuing our TestFlight-exclusive testing of Backups. See the beta release post for 7.79 for more details.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter! Weâ€™ve added a new beta-only notification if your device runs into certain validation errors, so let us know if you see that.

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if youâ€™re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.84 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.85.0.1148-beta

79 new commits since 7.84.0.1139-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.85 [1]

  • Try adding UIScrollEdgeElementContainerInteraction to a smaller part of the toolbar. [â€¦] [2]

  • Emoji sheet improvements [3]

  • Change backup badging behavior [4]

  • Tweak spacing around text input field. [5]

  • Use ACIs for mention candidates [6]

  • Update "suggested stickers" panel appearance for iOS 26. [â€¦] [7]

  • Fix messy chat input field layout when built with Xcode 16.4 [8]

  • Add reactions to poll backups [9]

  • Add expiry timer to poll terminate message [10]

  • Fix incorrect title color for the large blue SwiftUI button style. [â€¦] [11]

  • More updates to "suggested stickers" UI. [â€¦] [12]

  • Add ReceiptCredentialManager to handle shared ReceiptCredential logic [13]

  • Drop legacy donation errors [14]

  • Deprotocolize DonationReceiptCredentialResultStore [15]

  • Make UsernameLookupRecord unique by username [16]

  • Send range instead of length when fetching CDN info [17]

  • Add OWSBase2ByteCountFudger to format GiB as GB [18]

  • Update color handling in conversation input toolbar + style updates. [19]

  • On iOS 26 let Theme.primaryIconColor return primary text color. [20]

  • Handle the CANCELED subscription status for IAP [21]

  • Use Acis in GroupNameColors [22]

  • Use Acis in mentionedAddresses(â€¦) [23]

  • Use Aci for incomingRing(caller:â€¦) [24]

  • Remove SignalAttachment.error property [25]

  • Remove outdated comments and fallback behavior [26]

  • Remove parallelization thatâ€™s not necessary [27]

  • Asyncify outputAttachmentsPromise [28]

  • Write binary service IDs in staging [29]

  • Fix checkbox & vote count layout for long options [30]

  • Change registration build flag [31]

  • Update more uses of registration build flag [32]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.3 [33]

  • Minor chat input bar fixes. [34]

  • Add star icon to winning poll [35]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.85.6 [36]

  • Fetch fewer descriptors when sharing contacts [37]

  • Polls backups failures [38]

  • improve animations for "edit message" and quoted message UI. [â€¦] [39]

  • Add blur background to quoted message snippet in chat input bar on iOS 26. [â€¦] [40]

  • Reaction list sheet tweaks [41]

  • Fix handling of call links when restoring [42]

  • Repair malformed call links [43]

  • Mitigate iOS 26.1 growing chat list [44]

  • Two warn -> info log lines in AttachmentUpload [45]

  • Use native search bar and sheet for conversation picker [46]

  • Update text alignment on backup plan title. [47]

  • Update styling for mentions picker in chat. [â€¦] [48]

  • [49]

  • Update spacing on backups intro view [50]

  • Use safe area bar for pinned footers on iOS 26 [51]

  • Glass member action sheet [52]

  • Structify SignalRecipient [53]

  • Add bio/bioEmoji to backups [54]

  • Fix flicker when opening media by adjusting transition view alpha [55]

  • Show disabled send button when there's a quoted message but no message content. [56]

  • Two minor improvements to mentions panel. [57]

  • Improve animations when editing a message. [58]

  • Make glass in chat input toolbar interactive. [59]

  • Only do rounded inset selection background on iOS 26 when built against iOS 26 SDK. [60]

  • Remove TestableModelReadCacheFactory [61]

  • Make Backup subscription icon 64x64 [62]

  • Update to Xcode 26.1 [63] (reverted by [72])

  • Add insertRecord for SignalRecipient [64]

  • Make SignalRecipient.id non-Optional [65]

  • Use stricter types to represent Backup failure Chat List alerts [66]

  • Migrate TSInfoMessage group updates using a BGProcessingTask [67]

  • Finer-grained control over ContextMenuButton state [68]

  • Remove convenience indirection in CLVViewState types [69]

  • Update release notes [70]

  • Update translations [71]

  • Revert "Update to Xcode 26.1" [72] (reverts [63])

  • Revert "Relax Xcode version checks in GitHub Actions" [73]

  • Revert "Use Xcode 26.0.1" [74]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [75]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [76]

  • Uniquify usernames case-insensitively [77]

  • Remove TESTABLE_BUILD gate on NSKeyedUnarchiver extension [78]

  • Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/release/7.85' into release/7.85 [79]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.84.0.1139-betaâ€¦7.85.0.1148-beta

Localization changes

No localization changes fit in character limit. You can view the full comparison to 7.84.0.1139-beta so far here. Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

Bug: selecting a chat and navigating back to the chat list, the chat remains in the selected state.

Expected: no chat remains selected in the chat list.

I hope the sticker recommendation window gets a bit more polished, at least some rounded corners would be nice

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.85.0/5befdc8d54b1a5d7b1b5e62e70447710eeeaeb20b65bad0b81c3e5cf6d1b09e1.zip

posts.name: Robert Grey
posts.cooked:
Also having same issue as @edwinlai regarding selected recipient.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.85.0/b3fd1ccf24d6e9fd8b2f743a77b7ed1a202ff7756b59f6c6dc33c86f167e3e6a.zip

Bug with video calling, your own video view doesnâ€™t respect device rotation lock system setting. Iâ€™ve noticed this on both iOS 26 and iOS 18 a few Signal builds ago.

Repro: begin a video call with iPhone in portrait physical orientation. iOS rotation lock on. Rotate the iPhone physical orientation to landscape. Tap on PIP video once to enlarge it.

Actual: PIP rotates to landscape orientation

Expected: PIP maintains portrait orientation due orientation lock.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.86 release

posts.cooked:
Can you provide a debug log as described here?

https://support.signal.org/hc/en-us/articles/360007318591-Debug-Logs-and-Crash-Reports

I had a first failed backup message with this version

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.85.0/4f2541cee80659bddc9a52289301722e81a0e6ec337402003cf40e3d2e841692.zip

Iâ€™m considering switching from Android to iOS and as far as I know, there is currently no way to transfer my message history. Will Signal Secure Backups allow me to transfer my chats to my new phone?

posts.name: Jeremy
posts.cooked: Yes, that is the plan once it is out of beta
Thatâ€™s great! I assume there is no fixed timeline and itâ€™ll simply be ready when itâ€™s ready? If so Iâ€™ll just keep holding on to my old phone, really donâ€™t want to lose my message history.
